items.title: Dan Houser: GTA, Red Dead Redemption, Rockstar, Absurd & Future of Gaming | Lex Fridman Podcast #484
items.author: Lex Fridman
items.content:
<article>Dan Houser is co-founder of Rockstar Games and legendary creative mind behind Grand Theft Auto (GTA) and Red Dead Redemption series of video games.

items.title: Julia Shaw: Criminal Psychology of Murder, Serial Killers, Memory & Sex | Lex Fridman Podcast #483
items.author: Lex Fridman
items.content:
<article>Julia Shaw is a criminal psychologist and author who in her books explores human nature, including psychopathy, violent crime, the psychology of evil, police interrogation, false memory manipulation, deception detection, and human sexuality.
Thank you for listening ❤ Check out our sponsors: https://lexfridman.com/sponsors/ep483-sb
See below for timestamps, transcript, and to give feedback, submit questions, contact Lex, etc.
